    • Method Detail

      • add

        private void add(java.awt.Component component,
                 int row,
                 int column,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Using polymorphism, this method takes in any component to add to the frame and adds it to the layout at the row column specified with the width and height specified.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to be added to the frame
        row - Row the component to be added at
        column - Column the component to be added at
        width - Width the of the component
        height - Height of the component
